title: About competitions and wrestling
review: A film about the creators of a sports car for ford by Carroll Shelby and Ken Miles. Shows the struggle and competitive spirit between the two companies Ford and Ferrari. Fighting individuals with corporate leadership goals. A balance is maintained between racing action scenes and dramatic moments. You, as a spectator, believe in Bale's game and what is happening on the screen. Worth mentioning is CGI, which harmoniously complements the racing scene. Sad only olied and expectad ending.

title: Game with emotions 7/10
review: The film balances between ridiculous black jokes and the drama of the main character after a failed mission. There are no special feelings after viewing, but do not waste time in vain. A great entertaining movie with a great dwarf.
